name: Cooking Jam!
description:
Link

Don't play my game above

To play my game, click here!

How to play!

move mouse to look

use w, a, s, and d to move.

go to the bottom of the map to the kitchen.

in the bottom left corner is the feezer. Go there to get frozen milk. 

to exit a menu, click outside of the white box.

with the milk, go to the oven to the right of that. 

change slots in your hotbar at the bottom of your screen by pressing the numbers corresponding to them. 

click the oven with the milk in your main slot.

you should now have cheese. 

with the cheese, go to an AI customer. 

Go to the puddle to get water

go to the cutting board to get lobster

go to the trash pile to dispose of your hotbar

go to the crate to watch an ad to get cheese.

have fun!

More info

This game has been made for the Modd.io game jam

theme: Restaurant.
